qas.question: What is gustatory communication include in dogs?
People communicate with dogs by voice commands, body language or posture and what else?
Eye gaze, vocalization and body posture are examples of what?
In addition to vocalization and body posture, how do people communicate with dogs?

context: <a2_0>Dog communication<a2_0/> is about how dogs "speak" to each other, how they understand messages that humans send to them, and how humans can translate the ideas that dogs are trying to transmit.:xii These communication behaviors include eye gaze, facial expression, vocalization, body posture (including movements of bodies and limbs) and gustatory communication (<a0_0>scents, pheromones and taste<a0_0/>). Humans communicate with dogs by using vocalization, <a1_0><a3_0>hand signals<a3_0/><a1_0/> and body posture.
